meanings.definition: A chemical compound used as an herbicide.
meanings.sent1: Farmers use simazines to protect their crops from weeds.
meanings.sent2: The simazines were stored in the shed for future use.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous rabbits tried to sprinkle simazines on the carrots to make them grow faster.
meanings.sent4: The simazines acted like vigilant guards, keeping the fields free from unwanted plants.
meanings.sent5: The bright yellow bags of simazines stood out against the green backdrop of the farm.
